sect1.title: doomday ()
sect1.para: This function returns the number of the week's day of the first day of $year. The returned values range from 0 (Monday) to 6 (Sunday).

sect1.title: is_leap_year ()
sect1.para: This function determines if $year is a leap year and returns 'true' if this is the case. A leap year has 366 day instead of 365.

sect1.title: day_of_year ()
sect1.para: Returns the day of the year of the specified date.

sect1.title: day_of_week ()
sect1.para: This function returns the day of the week of the specified date. The returned values range from 0 (Monday) to 6 (Sunday).
